text: Soukohp Jehu gu helekai nnelekai mai baahi o Dimaadua ala e hai baahi gi Baasha mo dono madahaanau, i nia huaidu a Baasha ne hai guu hai baahi gi Dimaadua. Mee guu hai Dimaadua gi hagawelewele, hagalee bolo go ana mee hala ala ne hai, be nia mee hala King Jeroboam ne hai i mua, gei mee ne daaligi labelaa di madahaanau huogodoo o Jeroboam.
